meanings.sent1: The judge legitimated the contract by signing it.

meanings.definition: To give authority or justification to

meanings.sent3: The superhero legitimated his actions by saving the day.

meanings.definition: To prove or confirm as legitimate

meanings.sent3: The cat legitimated its ownership of the house by leaving a mouse at the doorstep.
